thread.title: Cubs hit six home runs against the Cardinals, take NLDS lead
thread.title_full: Cubs hit six home runs against the Cardinals, take NLDS lead

author: JAY COHEN
title: Cubs hit six home runs against the Cardinals, take NLDS lead
text: Baseball Chicago Cubs shortstop Addison Russell dives into third base after hitting a triple during the fourth inning against the St. Louis Cardinals in game three of the NLDS at Wrigley Field. On Tuesday, the Cubs will try to advance to the NLCS for the first time in 12 years. (Dennis Wierzbicki/USA Today Sports) Chicago Cubs shortstop Addison Russell dives into third base after hitting a triple during the fourth inning against the St. Louis Cardinals in game three of the NLDS at Wrigley Field. On Tuesday, the Cubs will try to advance to the NLCS for the first time in 12 years.(Dennis Wierzbicki/USA Today Sports) Cubs 8, Cardinals 6 (Chicago leads series 2-1) Cubs hit six home runs against the Cardinals, take NLDS lead Add to ... JAY COHEN
